definitions: a tropical American tanager with a long curved bill, feeding on nectar and insects.

notes.text: Genera Cyanerpes and Chlorophanes, family Emberizidae (subfamily Thraupinae): five species

shortDefinitions: tropical American tanager songbird with long curved bill, feeding on nectar and insects

definitions: a Hawaiian songbird of variable appearance and with a specialized bill, several kinds of which are now endangered.

notes.text: Family Drepanididae (or Fringillidae): several genera and species, often with Hawaiian names such as the iiwi and ou

shortDefinitions: Hawaiian songbird of variable appearance and with specialized bill
